text: The first day on the zombie apocalypse is really important.
$(br2)Your objective is to find Puff-shrooms on the surface and punch them. When they die, they drop Plant Food.
$(br)After finding x2 Plant Food, craft a Sunflower.
Sunflowers are the most important plants to make. They produce Sun, which are used to craft every other plant.
$(br)After crafting your Sunflowers, find a nice place to call home and plant them on your lawn.
When you place your Sunflower, you will notice that it will give you 2 Suns already, this is the perfect amount to make a Peashooter, make one.
You may have already noticed the main threat of this mod by this point: the Zombies.
$(br)While you can defeat them by yourself with skill, they have a lot of health and will easily overwhelm you, so the best solution is to craft Plants.
Your first Peashooter will be crucial on dealing with them quickly, but only one Peashooter is too weak, be sure to aid it by attacking Coneheads and planting more Plants.
The Zombies will spawn from things called "Graves", at the start the Graves will vanish the moment they spawn a group of zombies, but later on they will stay for longer.
$(br2)While you wait for night time, we recommend crafting these plants to help you.
